about_the_game:
―――GOD SAID

　　　　「YOU CAN BECOME A GOD」。

―――GOD SAID

　　　　「RISE TO THE TOP AND BECOME A GOD」

―――GOD SAID

　　　　「EVEN SLIME IS OKAY, I GUESS」

◆ About the Game

This is a vertical-scrolling action game where players can harm each other. Embark on this challenging journey with your friends.

  • ・Over 10 hours of torturous gameplay

  • Collectible appearance elements

  • Achievements

  • Friendship (Destruction) mode, where players can harm each other

  • Real-time saving mechanism in career mode

  • Racing leaderboards

◆ Game Modes

・Slime Career

Embark on a lonely journey alone and experience various emotions such as helplessness, impatience, and anger during the grueling climb that spans over 10 hours or more. Each jump brings you closer to the "truth" at the mountain's summit.

・Multiplayer Cooperation & Multiplayer Race

Includes multiplayer cooperation ascent and multiplayer race modes. Play cooperatively with your friends or push them back to the starting point.

◆ Controls

We have prepared two "unique" control methods for you.

・Full Action Mode

Movement: Arrow keys (left and right)

Jump: Spacebar

In this control mode, movement and jumping are divided between the left and right hands, engaging both the left and right brain simultaneously for 100% focused gameplay. Your precision in controls is estimated to be 35% higher than usual.

・Relaxation Leisure Mode

Movement: Keyboard keys "A" and "D"

Jump: Spacebar

The "Relaxation Leisure Mode" allows for one-handed operation, freeing up your right hand to do other things like eating snacks, browsing TikTok, or playing mobile games.

※ESC：PAUSE

◆COMMUNITY

short_description: If mutual harm is a human instinct, then we want to magnify it infinitely! Slime Climb Scrum can sprinkle a specks of darkness onto you (your) wonderful life! A 2D vertical-axis, high-difficulty jumping game that supports multiplayer cooperation and challenge modes!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
